conbody.p: If neither the Node Controller nor the Cluster Controller report the instance, check the Cloud Controller and ensure that it reports sending the instance to the Cluster Controller. Search the cloud-output.log file for euca:RunInstancesType using the following command:cat /var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-output.log | grep euca:RunInstancesType \ [| less]The last part of the command (| less) is optional, but may be useful if a large amount of data is returned. You can also use grep to search for the instance ID in the cloud-output.log file on the Cloud Controller.
